description: Play outcome state machine for football play evaluation

steps.name: Determine Basic Play Outcome
steps.description: Roll 1-100 to determine if play is Success, Unsuccessful, Havoc, or Explosive
steps.adjustments: Apply personnel-based adjustments (+/- 10% from baseline based on player matchups)

steps.name: Apply Personnel Adjustments
steps.description: Adjust outcome probabilities based on player percentile ratings and traits

steps.name: Explosive Play YAC Check
steps.description: Roll for YAC (yards after catch/contact). Base tackle percentage is 40%

steps.name: Non-Explosive YAC Check
steps.description: Roll for YAC. Base tackle percentage is 60%

steps.name: Havoc Outcome Roll
steps.description: Determine specific havoc outcome (sack, turnover, TFL, etc.)

steps.name: Calculate Yards Gained
steps.description: Based on outcome type, calculate yards gained using outcome distribution

steps.name: Update Game State
steps.description: Update gamestate.json with new down, distance, yardline, and score

steps.name: Update Fatigue
steps.description: Apply logarithmic fatigue to player stamina and adjust percentile ratings
